content.rendered:
Thai Red Fish-Style Curry

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 box Fry’s Fish-Style Fillets, defrosted and then each cut into 6 pieces
2 Tbsp oil
½ cup red onion, sliced
1 red pepper, sliced in strips
1 400g can coconut milk
1 packet Robertson’s Thai Red Curry Seasoning
200g courgette, cut at an angle
100g baby corn, sliced
100g sugar snap peas, sliced

Directions

Heat the oil in a large frying pan.

Fry the onion and red pepper until soft.

Add the coconut milk and Robertson’s Thai Red Curry Seasoning to the pan and mix well.

Add the courgettes, baby corn and Fry’s Fish and simmer for 5-7 minutes.

Stir in the sugar snap peas and garnish with chopped spring onions.

Serve with rice.
